column4: Hey, guys.  What's a good way to make a back-up image of my entire drive?  I just want an image that can be stored on my external drive and able to be restored later.
also have a look at 'man dd'
Oh, yeah, I forgot about dd.  That's actually exactly what I need
be carefull with what you give in of= for dd, or else it may wipe out your external drive
